content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0)
- Furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -46.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-17.5, -47.5)
- BeltGroup connecting the mining drill to the chest and the chest to the furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Before inserting items into an entity, check its inventory capacity to ensure there is enough space.

## NAMESPACE

### Important variables
- None
